metadata.title: CVE-2024-35823 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vt: fix unicode buffer corruption when deleting charactersThis is the same issue that was fixed for the VGA text buffer in commit39cdb68c64d8 ("vt: fix memory overlapping when deleting chars in thebuffer"). The cure is also the same i.e. replace memcpy() with memmove()due to the overlaping buffers.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
